overview: Unexpectedly, Firman and his friends found an orangutan who had escaped and was running from the pursuit of Indonesian endangered species smugglers. Firman and his friends who really love animals try to protect the Orang Utan. With the help of everyone in charge, they try to thwart and save these endangered species. Did Firman and his friends succeed in saving these endangered species?
title: Kun Ana Wa Anta
